name: myheartcounts-firebase
description: Stanford Biodesign Digital Health MyHeart Counts open-source project

scripts.install: npm --prefix functions/models install --save-dev && npm --prefix functions install --save-dev
scripts.lint: npm --prefix functions/models run lint && npm --prefix functions run lint
scripts.lint:fix: npm --prefix functions/models run lint:fix && npm --prefix functions run lint:fix
scripts.lint:strict: npm --prefix functions/models run lint:strict && npm --prefix functions run lint:strict
scripts.build: npm --prefix functions/models run build && npm --prefix functions run build
scripts.clean: npm --prefix functions/models run clean && npm --prefix functions run clean
scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run install && npm run build
